name: Team Slay-Bells
storyline:
There's a secret treasure known as the "Mega Bell" hidden on the farthest planet in her solar system. Kringlaus is falling apart, and Charlotte reads that the fabled "Maga Bell" will help restore the planet with its powerful ringing.

Charlotte's plan is to go around to collect enough "Sparkle Carrots" to power her spaceship, hopefully making it to her destination. She will need to collect enough bells to get through some areas though! Travel isn't cheap.

However... outside of bells being a currency, Charlotte and her friends also wields a trusty bell collar! these bell collars help them gather bells to pay for their travels. They can also be used to "slay" dangerous monsters they come across!

Charlotte and friends have a long journey ahead of them! During their adventure, they will travel, collect, and make even more friends that will help them on their journey to collect the "Mega Bell"!
summary: Team Slay-Bells is about a reindeer named Charlotte and her friends, who are trying to help their home planet Kringlaus.
